com.vorlonsoft.android.rate

Class AppCompatDialogManager.Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vorlonsoft.android.rate.AppCompatDialogManager.Factory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DialogManager.Factory
    Enclosing class:
    AppCompatDialogManager

    public static class AppCompatDialogManager.Factory
extends Object
implements DialogManager.Factory

    AppCompatDialogManager.Factory Class - v7 AppCompat library dialog manager factory class implements DialogManager.Factory interface of the AndroidRate library.

    You can extend AppCompatDialogManager.Factory Class and use AppRate.setDialogManagerFactory(DialogManager.Factory) if you want to use fully custom dialog (from v7 AppCompat library).

    Since:
    1.2.1
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Alexander Savin
    See Also:
    DialogManager.Factory

      • createDialogManager

        public DialogManager createDialogManager(Context context,
                                         DialogOptions dialogOptions,
                                         StoreOptions storeOptions)

        Creates AppCompatDialogManager singleton object. DefaultDialogManager singleton object will be created for API levels 13 and below instead

        Specified by:
        createDialogManager in interface DialogManager.Factory
        Parameters:
        context - context
        dialogOptions - Rate Dialog options
        storeOptions - App store options
        Returns:
        AppCompatDialogManager singleton object for API levels 14 and higher, DefaultDialogManager singleton object for API levels 13 and below
